public class Dropdown
extends SelectElement
Dropdown implementation of a WebElement.

  • Constructor Details

    • Dropdown

      public Dropdown​(java.lang.String elementName, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> selectors)
      Implementation of a SelectElement to initialize how an element is going to be found when it is worked on by the WebDriver class. Takes a reference to the WebDriver class that will be exercising its functionality.
      Parameters:
      elementName - String the name of the element
      selectors - Map<String,String> the list of selectors to use to find the element
